backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing two frontend features for adding a Circuit Division section and image asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders the app within SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Provides layout wrapper with nav, outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with copper-themed light and dark design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Component that renders nothing for placeholder routes.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Renders the Divisions page with styled sections for Forge and Archive divisions, including images and descriptive text.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero banner and feature cards linking to other site sections like lore, history, ranks, and divisions.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Implements the Ranks page with a hero section and detailed cardâ€‘based descriptions of leadership and other rank categories.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and utilities for the site's copper-themed design.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing implemented features, requirements, and design notes for the Brotherhood of Copper site.
